trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>evento si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio e consente all'origine del trascinamento di determinare se l'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio deve essere annullata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: A QueryContinueDragEventArgs specifies whether and how the drag-and-drop operation should proceed, whether any modifier keys are pressed, and whether the user has pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Un QueryContinueDragEventArgs specifica se e come l'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio deve continuare se vengono premuti i tasti di modifica e se l'utente ha premuto il tasto ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>set di eventi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>Se viene premuto il tasto ESC e imposta `Action` per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>Se viene premuto il pulsante sinistro, centrale o destro del mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sul modello di eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato corrente dei tasti MAIUSC, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è stato premuto il tasto ESC; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the status of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stato di un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets Action to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>evento imposta azione <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>Se viene premuto il tasto ESC e imposta `Action` per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>Se viene premuto il pulsante sinistro, centrale o destro del mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the user pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'utente ha premuto il tasto ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if EscapePressed is true.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>set di eventi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se EscapePressed è true.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è stato premuto il tasto ESC; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato corrente del MAIUSC, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: The bits that are set in the KeyState property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation.
trans-unit.target: I bit impostati nella proprietà KeyState identificano le chiavi o i pulsanti del mouse premuti durante l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the KeyState property is set.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se viene premuto il pulsante sinistro del mouse, viene impostato il primo bit nella proprietà KeyState.

trans-unit.source: You can use the bitwise `AND` operator to test for a given key state.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il bit per bit `AND` operatore per eseguire il test per un determinato stato di chiave.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the bits that are set for a specified event.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencati i bit sono impostati per un evento specificato.

trans-unit.source: |Bit|Key| |---------|---------| |1|The left mouse button.| |2|The right mouse button.| |4|The SHIFT key.| |8|The CTL key.| |16|The middle mouse button.| |32|The ALT key.| By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if KeyState indicates that the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: | Bit | Chiave | |---------|---------| |&1; | Il pulsante sinistro del mouse. | |&2; | Il pulsante destro del mouse. | |&4; | Il tasto MAIUSC. | |&8; | Rappresenta il tasto CTRL. | |&16; | Pulsante centrale del mouse. | |&32; | Il tasto ALT. | Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>set di eventi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se KeyState indica che il pulsante sinistro, centrale o destro del mouse è premuto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato corrente dei tasti MAIUSC, CTRL e ALT.
